item.description:
It's about time for another Karaoke night....the Turkey Eve karaoke night is always so much fun, but why wait till November??

Singing is not required, but why not let your inner rockstar come out to play?

Meet up at 9, and FYI there's plenty of parking either behind Jimmy's, or at the bank a few doors down.

No cover, and relatively cheap (by Newport standards) drinks! (which always helps with the singing!)

 

 

Ok, I have to edit this meet...turns out ther is not karaoke at Jimmy's on the 7th. I put it as next week for now, I'll find out if they do in fact have karaoke next sat night and I'll let everyone know.  Thanks, and sorry for any inconvenience!
item.name: Karaoke Night!
